text.section:
The Department in consultation with the Board shall:
establish and administer a program to provide cost-efficient, 24-hour, dual party relay service to program participants at a comparable level of access and quality that a standard telecommunication service provides to a person without a hearing or speech disability;
develop the program in collaboration with State programs currently serving disabled individuals and with community agencies or other organizations that have established relay programs; and
maintain an information and referral service to provide information about the availability of the relay service.

The Department in consultation with the Board may:
contract with a private vendor or nonprofit organization to provide the information and referral service required under subsection (a)(3) of this section; and
provide appropriate staff assistance from the Department to assist the Board in carrying out its duties under this subtitle.
